name: Psych-DS Template Dataset
description:
This is a template directory designed to support creating Psych-DS 
     directories, by providing a Psych-DS compliant dataset of imaginary information 
     about knitting projects.
author: Melissa Kline Struhl

variableMeasured.name: sub_id
variableMeasured.description:
Identity of participant (the knitter of each garment.)  A 
            unique, anonymous string for each individual, e.g. 'bb8'.

variableMeasured.name: date
variableMeasured.description: The date a garment was completed

variableMeasured.name: garment
variableMeasured.description: Type of garment, e.g. hat, sweater, snood.

variableMeasured.name: yarn_color
variableMeasured.description:
What color yarn was used in the garment, using the full name 
            that appears on the yarn label, e.g. 'Mint Green'.
